long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
V1.0.3
*UPDATE*
- Minor bug fixes and better text readability on the extension.

Text Tube is a simple chrome extension that saves you repeated travels from websites to your desired paste locations.   

You can spend more time searching for content and keep all your copied text in one safe place. After youâ€™re done with all your sherlock findings you can copy all the content from the extension at once and paste them to your preferred location.
